Hello

I am a UX Designer and Front-End Developer with extensive experience making web things. In my various roles, I have always sought clean and elegant solutions to user-interface challenges. In whatever capacity I’m in, I seek to make user experiences that are intuitive, accessible and beautiful.

UX Design Philosophy

Every project presents its own set of challenges. There is no one-size-fits-all approach to good user experience. There are, however, fundamentals of UX that have developed over the time that digital consumers have come to expect. In my time in the industry, I have developed an understanding of those expectations. It has been interesting to see the UX field expand in tandem with the capabilities of today's front-end technologies, but designers and developers should never sacrfice usability in favor of the latest technical gewgaw.

Projects

As a small business and as an employee of some excellent companies, I've had the pleasure of working with great clients on great projects. If there is one thing for certain, it's that every client is unique and therefore demands a unique approach to acheiving their goals.

Graphic Design

MOTION GRAPHICS

Designs are great, but even better when they get moving. 2bit uses a variety of technologies to create dynamic videos and presentations, banners and web sites.

  • Adobe After Effects

    Adobe’s premiere video editing and special effects software is used extensively in the video (and was used to make the reel itself).

  • Adobe Photoshop

    The industry standard in graphics production, it’s hard to imagine life without it.

  • Adobe Illustrator

    Adobe's main vector art program. Incredibly versatile.
